籤詩版本二:
Waziphonsa esangweni letorii elibaziweyo ngaphansi kwedwala ukuze ambuyisele indoda.
Ubani ongayithola uma uhlela kusenesikhathi akekho ongahamba emhlabeni.
詩意:
Le hexagram ibeka isithombe senyoni yethusi edwaleni.
Uphawu lwenhlanhla kukho konke.
解曰: Yidla ngaphandle kwezinhlanzi. Ukuhlanzeka nokujabula kumpofu. Linda i-Tetra Pak. Amandla nabantu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Umusa uhlangana neNkosi
Ebukhosini baseTang, uXue Li (614-683), igama elihlonishwayo uRengui, wazalelwa eLongmen, eJiangzhou (manje eyiHejin, Shanxi).
UXue Rengui wajoyina ibutho izikhathi ezintathu, esebenza njengesosha lokudla kuphela.
Lapho uMbusi uTaizong (uLi Shimin) woBukhosi BamaTang ejahwa uGaisu, wayesengozini futhi watakulwa uRengui.
Okusho ukuthi, waqanjwa ngokuthi i-marshal ngu-Emperor Taizong we-Tang Dynasty, wahola amabutho empumalanga, futhi wazuza okuningi kwezempi.
聖意: Umuzi awumuhle kumuntu uyathandeka, unobuhle, unenhlanhla, kunzima ukuba nenhlanhla, kunzima ukuhwebelana, umshado ujwayelekile, uLiujia uphephile, abantu baseduze namasimu. itshalwe kusenesikhathi imfuyo eyisithupha yonakala abantu abasekho amacala omphakathi ayathethelelwa ukufuduka kuhle kakhulu impahla elahlekile iyatholakala izifo ziyatholakala thumelani ethuneni lasezintabeni niyothula.
